name: VOIDSEEKER
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1!
We've been experimenting with our miniature black-hole. We can successfully send agents in and get agents out of it without any concerning side-effects.

VOIDSEEKER is a high-octane, fast-paced FPS game in a futuristic, cyberpunk-like style. Dive in the VOID-MATRIX, created by crazy scientists at FutureVision, and fight your way through the robots and guardians of the depths.

To go deeper we need to find a stage with the highest iteration value, since it's the most unstable.

An end is a new beginning. A single layer of the void has multiple iterations of it's level. Go through all iterations and you can advance to the next depth.
Every layer starts with a basis, which gets built upon.
The deeper you go, the more distorted reality becomes.

We just broke our depth record. Agent 6214 reached layer 41 in 11 hours, 42 minutes and 14 seconds, Earth time.

What's at the bottom? Is there a bottom? Will you be able to leave in a singe piece?

Created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 by:

  • Dániel "Fuwa" Mayer
  • Tamás "SETA" Szép
  • (Gaspar, with his unending amount of support)
